actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: Requiring the President to take retaliatory action against foreign barriers and restrictions that unfairly limit United States trade.

summary.text: Requires the President, if a foreign nation is applying a tariff or non-tariff barrier that is unduly burdening and restricting U.S. foreign trade, to: (1) apply a barrier similar in kind to that applied by the foreign nation and applicable to a similar product or service; and (2) take equivalent retaliatory action that affects goods or services, or both, of the foreign country.

titles.title: Requiring the President to take retaliatory action against foreign barriers and restrictions that unfairly limit United States trade.
